column4: hi All. I need some urgent help. Any ubuntu gutsy user here ?
Any one here with gutsy installed ? I want to see the content of /boot/grub/menu.lst
Gimme a sec and I'll have one for you in the paste bin
you can change panel color by going to properties

most of the gnome setting can be changed there
I took a good look, but if there's a key in there for the panel font, I couldn't find it
Just want to know whether these kernel parameters are default one, or u have modified them
